items.name: Extra Roll
items.description:
Roll an extra dice
(preserved if you roll a 6)

items.name: Poison
items.description: Slow down the next closest piece on the board for a few turns by halving their rolls

items.name: Roll Back
items.description: Roll a dice to move the first player on the board backwards

items.name: Double Up
items.description: Double the result of your next roll

items.name: Swap
items.description: Swap positions with the first player on the board

items.name: Antidote
items.description:
Heals poison and gives temporary snake immunity
(still vulnerable to player poison)
